title: Imperial City of Snowland - Novel Updates
author: Yi Yeqiu   一叶秋
description: To love or not to love, that proved to be just a mistake. Loyalty or belief turned out to be the wrong path. Even if I own the peaceful imperial city now, I only want to get back the days when we got together. If time went back and fate were adapted, would I still head for the inevitable ending without hesitation?>
